description:
For investigates the old Archdemon`s castle in order to find weapons to wield in her quest for revenge. However, before she can enter the estate, she`s beset by Raphael.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En tant que parent, je serais affolé, si ma fille fuguait
Musume ni Iede Saretara Oya Toshite wa Hisshi ni Naru Mono de
Of Course Parents Panic When Their Daughter Runs Away from Home
娘に家出されたら親としては必死になるもので
